title: Using the rational root theorem
text: What are the possible rational roots when we use the rational root theorem given the leading coeffcient and the constant term?

title: Rational root theorem
text: How do the denominators of the possible rationa root relate to the $$\frac{constant}{leading}$$ coefficient. Similarly how does the numerator relate to these coefficients?

title: Positive roots
text: What are the roots. Only select the positive roots but keep in mind the negative values of each of these roots would also be a potential rational root.
